main.name: Biniyam Belayneh
main.title: Senior Machine Learning Systems Engineer
main.description: Designing high-scale ML platforms and low-latency inference systems. Expert in AdTech & Telecom domains, specializing in distributed MLOps, Infrastructure as Code, and production-grade GenAI.

main.highlightSubtitle: 40% Cloud Cost Optimization • <20ms p99 Inference Latency • Distributed Training at Scale • Robust GenAI/LLMOps Pipelines
paragraphs: Senior Engineer with 5 years of experience across AdTech and Telecom, specializing in the intersection of Machine Learning, System Design, and Infrastructure. I architect end-to-end ML platforms on AWS and GCP that handle massive data volumes, utilizing Kubernetes (EKS/GKE), Terraform, and Kafka to ensure high availability and sub-100ms response times.

Deep expertise in MLOps and Software Engineering: I implement automated CI/CD for ML, real-time observability (Grafana/Prometheus), and feature stores (Feast). Proven track record of high-impact delivery: Engineered real-time bidding systems, reduced cloud overhead by 40%, and slashed deployment cycles from weeks to hours through robust automation and infrastructure-as-code.

expertise.title: ML Systems & Scale
expertise.description: Distributed training, low-latency serving (Triton/vLLM), and high-throughput data engineering.

expertise.title: Full-Stack MLOps
expertise.description: Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), Kubernetes orchestration, and automated model lifecycles.

expertise.title: Platform Reliability
expertise.description: Observability (LGTM stack), secret management, and system-wide monitoring for drift and latency.

main.name: Sarah Johnson
main.title: Senior Data Scientist
main.quote: Biniyam is rare in his ability to bridge the gap between complex ML research and production-grade engineering. His redesign of our inference stack reduced latency significantly, directly impacting our bottom line.

main.name: Michael Chen
main.title: Engineering Manager
main.quote: Biniyam's technical leadership in cloud architecture and Kubernetes transformed our infrastructure. He doesn't just build models; he builds the robust platforms that keep them running 24/7.
